name: Value

fields.name: messageID

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSMessageID() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSMessageID()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSMessageID() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSMessageID()>`_.

fields.name: messageType

type.connect.doc: This field stores the type of message that was received. This corresponds to the subinterfaces of `Message <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html>`_. `BytesMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/BytesMessage.html>`_ = `bytes`, `MapMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/MapMessage.html>`_ = `map`, `ObjectMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/ObjectMessage.html>`_ = `object`, `StreamMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/StreamMessage.html>`_ = `stream` and `TextMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/TextMessage.html>`_ = `text`. The corresponding field will be populated with the values from the respective Message subinterface.

fields.doc: This field stores the type of message that was received. This corresponds to the subinterfaces of `Message <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html>`_. `BytesMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/BytesMessage.html>`_ = `bytes`, `MapMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/MapMessage.html>`_ = `map`, `ObjectMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/ObjectMessage.html>`_ = `object`, `StreamMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/StreamMessage.html>`_ = `stream` and `TextMessage <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/TextMessage.html>`_ = `text`. The corresponding field will be populated with the values from the respective Message subinterface.

fields.name: timestamp

type.connect.doc: Data from the `getJMSTimestamp() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSTimestamp()>`_ method.

fields.doc: Data from the `getJMSTimestamp() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSTimestamp()>`_ method.

fields.name: deliveryMode

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSDeliveryMode() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSDeliveryMode()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSDeliveryMode() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSDeliveryMode()>`_.

fields.name: correlationID

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSCorrelationID() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSCorrelationID()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSCorrelationID() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSCorrelationID()>`_.

fields.name: replyTo

type.name: Destination

fields.name: destinationType

type.connect.doc: The type of JMS Destination, and either ``queue`` or ``topic``.

fields.doc: The type of JMS Destination, and either ``queue`` or ``topic``.

fields.name: name

type.connect.doc: The name of the destination. This will be the value of `Queue.getQueueName() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Queue.html#getQueueName()>`_ or `Topic.getTopicName() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Topic.html#getTopicName()>`_.

fields.doc: The name of the destination. This will be the value of `Queue.getQueueName() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Queue.html#getQueueName()>`_ or `Topic.getTopicName() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Topic.html#getTopicName()>`_.

type.connect.doc: This schema is used to represent a JMS Destination, and is either `queue <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Queue.html>`_ or `topic <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Topic.html>`_.
type.connect.name: io.confluent.connect.jms.Destination

fields.doc: This schema is used to represent a JMS Destination, and is either `queue <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Queue.html>`_ or `topic <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Topic.html>`_.

fields.name: destination
fields.doc: This schema is used to represent a JMS Destination, and is either `queue <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Queue.html>`_ or `topic <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Topic.html>`_.

fields.name: redelivered

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSRedelivered() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSRedelivered()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSRedelivered() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSRedelivered()>`_.

fields.name: type

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSType() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSType()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSType() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSType()>`_.

fields.name: expiration

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSExpiration() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSExpiration()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSExpiration() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSExpiration()>`_.

fields.name: priority

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSPriority() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSPriority()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value of `Message.getJMSPriority() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getJMSPriority()>`_.

fields.name: properties

values.name: PropertyValue

fields.name: propertyType

type.connect.doc: The java type of the property on the Message. One of ``boolean``, ``byte``, ``short``, ``integer``, ``long``, ``float``, ``double``, or ``string``.

fields.doc: The java type of the property on the Message. One of ``boolean``, ``byte``, ``short``, ``integer``, ``long``, ``float``, ``double``, or ``string``.

fields.name: boolean

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a boolean. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``boolean``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a boolean. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``boolean``.

fields.name: byte

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a byte. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``byte``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a byte. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``byte``.

fields.name: short

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a short. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``short``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a short. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``short``.

fields.name: integer

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a integer. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``integer``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a integer. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``integer``.

fields.name: long

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a long. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``long``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a long. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``long``.

fields.name: float

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a float. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``float``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a float. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``float``.

fields.name: double

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a double. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``double``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a double. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``double``.

fields.name: string

type.connect.doc: The value stored as a string. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``string``.

fields.doc: The value stored as a string. Null unless ``propertyType`` is set to ``string``.

values.connect.doc: This schema is used to store the data that is found in the properties of the message. To ensure that the proper type mappings are preserved field ``propertyType`` stores the value type for the field. The corresponding field in the schema will contain the data for the property. This ensures that the data is retrievable as the type returned by `Message.getObjectProperty() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/Message.html#getObjectProperty(java.lang.String)>`_.
values.connect.name: io.confluent.connect.jms.PropertyValue

type.connect.doc: This field stores the data from all of the properties for the Message indexed by their propertyName.

fields.doc: This field stores the data from all of the properties for the Message indexed by their propertyName.

fields.name: bytes

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value from `BytesMessage.html.readBytes(byte[]) <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/BytesMessage.html#readBytes(byte[])>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value from `BytesMessage.html.readBytes(byte[]) <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/BytesMessage.html#readBytes(byte[])>`_.

fields.name: map

type.connect.doc: This field stores the data from all of the map entries returned from `MapMessage.getMapNames() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/MapMessage.html#getMapNames()>`_ for the Message indexed by their key.

fields.doc: This field stores the data from all of the map entries returned from `MapMessage.getMapNames() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/MapMessage.html#getMapNames()>`_ for the Message indexed by their key.

fields.name: text

type.connect.doc: This field stores the value from `TextMessage.html.getText() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/TextMessage.html#getText()>`_.

fields.doc: This field stores the value from `TextMessage.html.getText() <http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/jms/TextMessage.html#getText()>`_.

connect.doc: This schema is used to store the value of the JMS message.
connect.name: io.confluent.connect.jms.Value
